verses.verse: "This is the thing <S%H1697><s%> that you shall do <S%H6213><s%> to them to make them holy, <S%H6942><s%> to minister to me in the priest <S%H3547><s%>'s office: take <S%H3947><s%> one <S%H259><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> bull <S%H6499><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> rams <S%H352><s%> without blemish, <S%H8549><s%>

unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> cakes <S%H2471><s%> mixed <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> and unleavened <S%H4682><s%> wafers <S%H7550><s%> anointed <S%H4886><s%> with oil: <S%H8081><s%> you shall make <S%H6213><s%> them of fine wheat <S%H2406><s%> flour. <S%H5560><s%>

You shall put <S%H5414><s%> them into one <S%H259><s%> basket, <S%H5536><s%> and bring <S%H7126><s%> them in the basket, <S%H5536><s%> with the bull <S%H6499><s%> and the two <S%H8147><s%> rams. <S%H352><s%>

You shall bring <S%H7126><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> and shall wash <S%H7364><s%> them with water. <S%H4325><s%>

You shall take <S%H3947><s%> the garments, <S%H899><s%> and put <S%H3847><s%> on Aaron <S%H175><s%> the coat, <S%H3801><s%> the robe <S%H4598><s%> of the ephod, <S%H646><s%> the ephod, <S%H646><s%> and the breastplate, <S%H2833><s%> and clothe <S%H640><s%> him with the skillfully woven band <S%H2805><s%> of the ephod; <S%H646><s%>
and you shall set <S%H7760><s%> the turban <S%H4701><s%> on his head, <S%H7218><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> crown <S%H5145><s%> on the turban. <S%H4701><s%>
Then you shall take <S%H3947><s%> the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> and pour <S%H3332><s%> it on his head, <S%H7218><s%> and anoint him. <S%H4886><s%>
You shall bring <S%H7126><s%> his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and put <S%H3847><s%> coats on them. <S%H3801><s%>

You shall clothe <S%H2296><s%> them with belts, <S%H73><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and bind <S%H2280><s%> headbands <S%H4021><s%> on them: <S%H3550><s%> and they shall have the priesthood by a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> statute: <S%H2708><s%> and you shall consecrate <S%H4390><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons. <S%H1121><s%>

"You shall bring <S%H7126><s%> the bull <S%H6499><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting: <S%H4150><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall lay <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> on the head <S%H7218><s%> of the bull. <S%H6499><s%>
You shall kill <S%H7819><s%> the bull <S%H6499><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting. <S%H4150><s%>

You shall take <S%H3947><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the bull, <S%H6499><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> it on the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> with your finger; <S%H676><s%> and you shall pour <S%H8210><s%> out all the blood <S%H1818><s%> at <S%H413><s%> the base <S%H3247><s%> of the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

You shall take <S%H3947><s%> all the fat <S%H2459><s%> that covers <S%H3680><s%> the innards, <S%H7130><s%> the cover <S%H3508><s%> of the liver, <S%H3516><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys, <S%H3629><s%> and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that is on them, <S%H6999><s%> and burn them on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

But the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the bull, <S%H6499><s%> and its skin, <S%H5785><s%> and its dung, <S%H6569><s%> you shall burn <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%> outside <S%H2351><s%> of the camp: <S%H4264><s%> it is a sin offering. <S%H2403><s%>

"You shall also take <S%H3947><s%> the one <S%H259><s%> ram; <S%H352><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall lay <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> on the head <S%H7218><s%> of the ram. <S%H352><s%>
You shall kill <S%H7819><s%> the ram, <S%H352><s%> and you shall take <S%H3947><s%> its blood, <S%H1818><s%> and sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> it around <S%H5439><s%> on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

You shall cut <S%H5408><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> into its pieces, <S%H5409><s%> and wash <S%H7364><s%> its innards, <S%H7130><s%> and its legs, <S%H3767><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> them with its pieces, <S%H5409><s%> and with its head. <S%H7218><s%>

You shall burn <S%H6999><s%> the whole ram <S%H352><s%> on the altar: <S%H4196><s%> it is a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> to Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> it is a pleasant <S%H5207><s%> aroma, <S%H7381><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

"You shall take <S%H3947><s%> the other <S%H8145><s%> ram; <S%H352><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall lay <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> on the head <S%H7218><s%> of the ram. <S%H352><s%>

Then you shall kill <S%H7819><s%> the ram, <S%H352><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> some of its blood, <S%H1818><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> it on the tip <S%H8571><s%> of the right ear <S%H241><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and on the tip <S%H8571><s%> of the right <S%H3233><s%> ear <S%H241><s%> of his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and on the thumb <S%H931><s%> of their right <S%H3233><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and on the big toe <S%H931><s%> of their right <S%H3233><s%> foot, <S%H7272><s%> and sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

You shall take <S%H3947><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> that is on the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and of the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> and sprinkle <S%H5137><s%> it on Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and on his garments, <S%H899><s%> and on his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and on the garments <S%H899><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%> with him: <S%H6942><s%> and he shall be made holy, and his garments, <S%H899><s%> and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%>' garments with him. <S%H899><s%>

Also you shall take <S%H3947><s%> some of the ram <S%H352><s%>'s fat, <S%H2459><s%> the fat tail, <S%H451><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> that covers <S%H3680><s%> the innards, <S%H7130><s%> the cover <S%H3508><s%> of the liver, <S%H3516><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys, <S%H3629><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> that is on them, <S%H3225><s%> and the right thigh <S%H7785><s%> (for it is a ram <S%H352><s%> of consecration <S%H4394><s%>),

and one <S%H259><s%> loaf <S%H3603><s%> of bread, <S%H3899><s%> one <S%H259><s%> cake <S%H2471><s%> of oiled <S%H8081><s%> bread, <S%H259><s%> and one wafer <S%H7550><s%> out of the basket <S%H5536><s%> of unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%> that is before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

You shall put <S%H7760><s%> all of this in Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s hands, <S%H3709><s%> and in his sons <S%H1121><s%>' hands, <S%H3709><s%> and shall wave <S%H5130><s%> them for a wave offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

You shall take <S%H3947><s%> them from their hands, <S%H3027><s%> and burn <S%H6999><s%> them on the altar <S%H4196><s%> on the burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> for a pleasant <S%H5207><s%> aroma <S%H7381><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> it is an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

"You shall take <S%H3947><s%> the breast <S%H2373><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s ram <S%H352><s%> of consecration, <S%H4394><s%> and wave <S%H5130><s%> it for a wave offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> and it shall be your portion. <S%H4490><s%>

You shall sanctify <S%H6942><s%> the breast <S%H2373><s%> of the wave offering, <S%H8573><s%> and the thigh <S%H7785><s%> of the wave offering, <S%H8573><s%> which is waved, <S%H5130><s%> and which is heaved up, <S%H7311><s%> of the ram <S%H352><s%> of consecration, <S%H4394><s%> even of that which <S%H834><s%> is for Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and of that which is for his sons: <S%H1121><s%>

and it shall be for Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> as their portion <S%H2706><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> from the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> for it is a wave offering: <S%H8641><s%> and it shall be a wave offering <S%H8641><s%> from the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> of the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of their peace offerings, <S%H8002><s%> even their wave offering <S%H8641><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

"The holy <S%H6944><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall be for his sons <S%H1121><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him, <S%H4888><s%> to be anointed in them, <S%H4390><s%> and to be consecrated in them.

Seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall the son <S%H1121><s%> who is priest <S%H3548><s%> in his place put <S%H3847><s%> them on, <S%H935><s%> when he comes into the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting <S%H4150><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> in the holy place. <S%H6944><s%>
"You shall take <S%H3947><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> of consecration, <S%H4394><s%> and boil <S%H1310><s%> its flesh <S%H1320><s%> in a holy <S%H6918><s%> place. <S%H4725><s%>

Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the ram, <S%H352><s%> and the bread <S%H3899><s%> that is in the basket, <S%H5536><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting. <S%H4150><s%>

They shall eat <S%H398><s%> those things with which atonement was made, <S%H3722><s%> to consecrate <S%H4390><s%> and sanctify <S%H6942><s%> them: <S%H2114><s%> but a stranger shall not eat <S%H398><s%> of it, <S%H6944><s%> because they are holy.

If anything of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the consecration, <S%H4394><s%> or of the bread, <S%H3899><s%> remains <S%H3498><s%> to the morning, <S%H1242><s%> then you shall burn <S%H8313><s%> the remainder <S%H3498><s%> with fire: <S%H784><s%> it shall not be eaten, <S%H398><s%> because it is holy. <S%H6944><s%>

"You shall do <S%H6213><s%> so to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and to his sons, <S%H1121><s%> according to all that I have commanded <S%H6680><s%> you. <S%H4390><s%> You shall consecrate them seven <S%H7651><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

Every day <S%H3117><s%> you shall offer <S%H6213><s%> the bull <S%H6499><s%> of sin offering <S%H2403><s%> for atonement: <S%H3725><s%> and you shall cleanse <S%H2398><s%> the altar, <S%H4196><s%> when you make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for it; <S%H4886><s%> and you shall anoint it, <S%H6942><s%> to sanctify it.

Seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and sanctify <S%H6942><s%> it: <S%H4196><s%> and the altar shall be most holy; <S%H6944><s%> whatever touches <S%H5060><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> shall be holy. <S%H6944><s%>

"Now this is that which you shall offer <S%H6213><s%> on the altar: <S%H4196><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old day <S%H3117><s%> by day <S%H3117><s%> continually. <S%H8548><s%>

The one <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> you shall offer <S%H6213><s%> in the morning; <S%H1242><s%> and the other <S%H8145><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> you shall offer <S%H6213><s%> at evening: <S%H6153><s%>

and with the one <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> a tenth <S%H6241><s%> part of an ephah of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mixed with the fourth part <S%H7253><s%> of a hin <S%H1969><s%> of beaten <S%H3795><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> and the fourth part <S%H7243><s%> of a hin <S%H1969><s%> of wine <S%H3196><s%> for a drink offering. <S%H5262><s%>

The other <S%H8145><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> you shall offer <S%H6213><s%> at evening, <S%H6153><s%> and shall do <S%H6213><s%> to it according to the meal offering <S%H4503><s%> of the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and according to its drink offering, <S%H5262><s%> for a pleasant <S%H5207><s%> aroma, <S%H7381><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

It shall be a continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting <S%H4150><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> where I will meet <S%H3259><s%> with you, <S%H1696><s%> to speak there to you.
There I will meet <S%H3259><s%> with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and the place shall be sanctified <S%H6942><s%> by my glory. <S%H3519><s%>

I will sanctify <S%H6942><s%> the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting <S%H4150><s%> and the altar: <S%H4196><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> also and his sons <S%H1121><s%> I will sanctify, <S%H6942><s%> to minister to me in the priest <S%H3547><s%>'s office.
I will dwell <S%H7931><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and will be their God. <S%H430><s%>

They shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> their God, <S%H430><s%> who brought them forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> that I might dwell <S%H7931><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them: <S%H3068><s%> I am Yahweh their God. <S%H430><s%>
